author: schneiml
body:
This is based on #22218 (thanks @fwyzard!), and supersedes #22157 (and also #22218).

- The migration will bring all of the memory savings of #22157. 
- It avoids the fallout of config changes (that is now isolated into #22243). Not that this is *not* required for this PR.
- It comes with some downsides from a framework point of view: This solution will *not* work with multiple, concurrent LS (and the lumi-watching `edm::one::EDAnalyzer` will block the framework from using them -- if I understand correctly, @Dr15Jones?). However, this is not an issue for now, since these are not used *anyways* in production. So this is a fine temporary solution, even for data taking.
- There is still an issue with per-lumi histograms that needs to be fixed.
- A conversion to `edm::one::EDProducer<Accumulator>` should be a trivial change on top of #22243 and this one.
title: Migrate DQM to `edm::one::EDAnalyzer`
